channel.title: TheVillageGist News Network
channel.description: Latest local news from Ewatto, Esan, and Edo State.

item.title: Ewatto Farmers Begin Land Preparation Ahead of New Farming Season
item.description: Farmers across Ewatto have started clearing lands for the 2025 farming season, with many focusing on cassava, yam, and pepper cultivation.

item.title: Esan South East Council Launches Rural Road Maintenance Initiative
item.description: The Esan South East Local Government Council has flagged off a community road maintenance project to improve rural access and transportation.

item.title: Youth Groups Call for Peace Ahead of Upcoming Community Elections
item.description: Youth leaders across Esan land are urging peace and tolerance as local elections draw near.
